title: Bella Hadid shares throwback backstage snaps from Rihanna's Savage X Fenty show
text:
She's fresh off the hottest runways at the international Fashion Weeks.

And Bella Hadid appeared to pine for her month-long appearances on the runway as she shared throwback backstage snaps from Rihanna's Savage X Fenty presentation in New York on Instagram on Wednesday.

The supermodel, 22, turned up the heat as she slipped into lace yellow lingerie with jewelled detailing, which she tied in with a hooded cape of the same intricate material.

'Yellow sky bathed in light': Bella Hadid pined for her Fashion Week appearances as she shared throwback backstage snaps from Rihanna's Savage X Fenty presentation on Wednesday

Highlighting her incredibly toned abs and perky cleavage, the catwalk queen looked sensational in a revealing bralet with matching briefs.

The Los Angeles native upped the style ante with her choice of accessories as she was decked out in gold statement jewellery, featuring a huge ring, floral-inspired bangles and coined belly chains.

With her brunette locks styled into quirky whorls, Bella complemented her beauty with smokey eyeshadow, heavy strokes of classic blusher and faint pink lipgloss.

The media personality captioned the posts: 'Yellow sky bathed in light... finally back in nyc watching The @savagexfenty on the big screen ! @badgalriri @illjahjah @parrisgoebel @kjeldgaard1 @pg_dmcasting Sick!!!'

Ooh-la-la: The supermodel, 22, turned up the heat as she slipped into lace yellow lingerie with jewelled detailing, which she tied in with a hooded cape of the same intricate material

Nine-time Grammy winner Rihanna, 31, kicked off her hour-long New York Fashion Week presentation at Brooklyn's Barclays Center with a sultry choreographed dance number.

Vogue called the slickly-staged performance art 'the event of the year' thanks to a large cast of models representing all genders, ages, and sizes.

Bella recently detailed her eating and workout routine during the international fashion weeks during an interview with Access.

The Weeknd's former girlfriend explained: 'You know, I tried to just start a little diet yesterday because I've really just been eating everything.

Wow-factor! Highlighting her incredibly toned abs and perky cleavage, the catwalk queen looked sensational in a revealing bralet with matching briefs

All in the details: The Los Angeles native upped the style ante with her choice of accessories as she was decked out in gold statement jewellery

'But I really love eating and it makes me happy and I love food and every day I try to start these diets and make myself healthier,' she told the outlet.

'I think that we're running around so much during Fashion Week that I'm just gonna grab that sandwich or that slice of pizza.

'It's just gonna happen and I just have to deal with it. But I definitely have to keep my workout routine ... keep it somewhat close. I went yesterday, maybe I'll go tomorrow.'

Impressive: Vogue called the slickly-staged showcase - which took place at Brooklyn's Barclays Center last month - 'the event of the year' (pictured with Gigi and Bella)

The former Fyre Festival promoter is newly-single after splitting with three-time Grammy winner The Weeknd for the second time in August.

'They hope to get back together at one point but for now are focusing on themselves and their projects,' a source told E! News.

'[They] haven't spent quality time together in months. They are in different places right now, physically and mentally. Bella is prepping for her fashion week commitments and Abel is working on his music and his upcoming acting debut.'
description: The supermodel, 22, shared throwback backstage snaps from Rihanna's Savage X Fenty presentation on Instagram on Wednesday.
